text: The young man said, “The Jews have agreed to ask yoʋ to bring Paul down to the Sanhedrin tomorrow, as though 23:20 the members of the Sanhedrin would be inquiring 26.6% ¦ they would be inquiring BYZ PCK TR 33.1% ¦ the members of the Sanhedrin would be inquired of ANT 17.6% ¦ yoʋ would be inquiring TH WH 9.2% ¦ the Sanhedrin would be inquiring ECM NA SBL 7.4%the members of the Sanhedrin would be inquiring about his case in greater detail.
